name: Suspicious Minimized MSEdge Start
description: Detects the suspicious minimized start of MsEdge browser, which can be used to download files from the Internet
false_positives: Software that uses MsEdge to download components in the background (see ParentImage, ParentCommandLine)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.command_line:*start\ \/min\ msedge*`
